12.text:
Version 2.3 - June 16, 2014
  • Added: Minimalist Header - without background image & padding
  • Added: Fancy Heading - choose whether you want to use H1 or H2 tag
  • Added: Clients - Categories
  • Added: Offer - Categories
  • Added: Portfolio Item - slider can be placed in the header or content
  • Added: Portfolio List - random order
